properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PW , USER_NAME , USER_BIRTH , USER_PHONE , USER_EMAIL , USER_ADDRESS , USER_ENROLLDATE , USER_STATUS , USER_GRADE , USER_BLOODTYPE , USER_LOGINDATE , USER_WITHDATE , USER_SUSDATE FROM MEMBER
INSERT INTO MEMBER(USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, USER_BIRTH, USER_EMAIL, USER_PHONE, USER_ADDRESS, USER_BLOODTYPE) VALUES (SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TODAY_MEMBER_COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_CHAR(USER_ENROLLDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') = To_char(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND USER_STATUS = 'NORMAL'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS MONTH_NEWMEMBER_COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_CHAR(USER_ENROLLDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN (TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')) AND TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE),'YYYYMMDD') AND USER_STATUS = 'NORMAL'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TODAY_DELMEMBER_COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_CHAR(USER_WITHDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') = To_char(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND USER_STATUS = 'WITHDRAWAL'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS MONTH_DELMEMBER_COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_CHAR(USER_ENROLLDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN (TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')) AND TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE),'YYYYMMDD') AND USER_STATUS = 'WITHDRAWAL'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TODAY_STOPMEMBER_COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_CHAR(USER_SUSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') = To_char(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND USER_STATUS = 'SUSPENSION'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS MONTH_STOPMEMBER_COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_CHAR(USER_SUSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN (TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM'),'YYYYMMDD')) AND TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE),'YYYYMMDD') AND USER_STATUS = 'SUSPENSION'
SELECT * FROM MEMBER JOIN BLOODINFO ON(USER_NO=BLOOD_OWNER) WHERE USER_ID=? AND USER_PW=? AND USER_STATUS='NORMAL'
INSERT INTO "SEMI"."BLOODINFO" (BLOOD_NO, BLOOD_COUNT, BLOOD_WH, BLOOD_OWNER) VALUES (? , ? , ? , (SELECT BLOOD_OWNER FROM BLOODINFO LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON (BLOOD_OWNER=USER_NO) WHERE USER_ID='?'))
SELECT USER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NAME=? AND USER_EMAIL=? AND USER_STATUS='NORMAL'
SELECT USER_PW FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID=? AND USER_NAME=? AND USER_EMAIL=? AND USER_STATUS='NORMAL'
UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_NAME = ? ,PHONE = ? ,EMAIL = ? ,ADDRESS = ? ,INTEREST = ? ,MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_STATUS='NORMAL'
UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_STATUS='WITHDRAWAL' , USER_WITHDATE=SYSDATE WHERE USER_ID=? AND USER_PW=?
